extension_desc.message: Simple new tab with beautiful daily wallpaper. Start search with your favorite search engine.

op_wallpaper_uhd_hint1.message: By default Ataraxia load wallpapers with 3840Ã—2160 resolution. UHD wallpapers are much clearer, but also take longer time to be loaded for the first time.

op_wallpaper_uhd_hint2.message: If you find it takes too much time or fails to load the wallpaper, please do not open UHD option.

op_api_prompt1.message: Set up Bing URLs for different regions.

op_api_prompt2.message: Mainly aimed at Chinese users who have traffic routing for www.bing.com and can access the international version of Bing, to set the wallpaper API to the domestic version of Bing.

op_saved_alert.message: Changes have been saved and will take effect when opening a new tab.

op_reset_default_confirm_alert.message: Are you sure you want to restore the default configuration?

op_reset_default_done_alert.message: Restored to default configuration. It will take effect when opening a new tab.
